Eden_Prairie.Valley View Middle School (Edina, Minnes: Valley View Middle School (formerly called Valley View Junior High School) is a three-year (grades 6-8), public middle school located in Edina, Minnesota, USA, a first ring suburb of Minneapolis. The school has a current enrollment of about 1,400 students. It, and its sister school South View Middle School, each take students from three of the six elementary schools of the Edina Public School System.
